name: PostHog
description: Connect your PostHog instance as the primary data source for behavioral signal detection.
tagline: Your product analytics, powering revenue intelligence

howItWorks.description: Provide your PostHog API credentials. Beton connects directly to your instance — no data export or migration needed.

howItWorks.step: Beton reads your events in real-time
howItWorks.description: Product analytics events flow through Beton's signal detection engine, analyzing user behavior patterns automatically.
Beton identifies buying intent, expansion opportunities, and churn risk from your PostHog event data.

features: Direct API connection — no data export needed
Supports all PostHog event types and properties
Historical data analysis for signal calibration
Zero impact on your PostHog performance
Works with PostHog Cloud and self-hosted
useCases: Detect when free users exhibit buying behavior in your product
Identify power users ready for expansion conversations
Spot churn signals before users downgrade or leave
Route product-qualified leads to your sales team automatically

seo.metaDescription: Connect PostHog to Beton for behavioral signal detection. Turn product analytics events into revenue signals automatically.

name: Attio

howItWorks.description: Authenticate Beton with your Attio API key. Map signal types to Attio record types and attributes.
Define which signals create new records, update existing ones, or trigger specific workflows in Attio.

howItWorks.step: Signals flow to Attio in real-time
howItWorks.description: When Beton detects a revenue signal, it automatically creates or updates the corresponding record in Attio.

features: Custom field mapping for signal context
Support for companies, contacts, and deals
Configurable routing rules per signal type
Full signal context attached to records
useCases: Auto-create deals when buying signals are detected

name: Webhooks
description: Send signals to any tool via webhooks. Build custom integrations with your existing stack.
tagline: Send revenue signals anywhere with HTTP webhooks

howItWorks.description: Provide any HTTP endpoint URL. Beton sends structured JSON payloads for each detected signal.
Choose which signal types to forward and customize the payload format to match your system's expectations.
Your endpoint receives a POST request with full signal context every time a matching signal is detected.

features: Standard HTTP POST with JSON payloads
useCases: Send signals to Slack channels for team visibility
Trigger custom scripts or serverless functions

name: n8n
description: Connect to n8n for unlimited automation. Route signals through complex multi-step workflows.
tagline: Unlimited automation possibilities with n8n workflows

howItWorks.step: Set up a Beton trigger in n8n
howItWorks.description: Add the Beton webhook trigger node to any n8n workflow. Configure which signal types should activate the workflow.
Use n8n's visual workflow builder to process signals — enrich data, apply logic, route to multiple destinations.
Every matching signal automatically kicks off your n8n workflow, executing your custom automation logic.

features: Compatible with all n8n nodes and integrations
Works with n8n Cloud and self-hosted
Full signal context in workflow data
useCases: Build multi-step enrichment and routing workflows
Combine signals with data from other sources before routing
Create complex approval workflows for high-value signals
